author: n3tsurge
description: This capability involves establishing a communication map that outlines how information will be shared during an incident. It includes identifying key stakeholders, defining communication channels, and ensuring that all parties understand their roles in the communication process. This is essential for effective coordination and response during security incidents.

requirements.description: Staff must be trained and qualified to perform this capability effectively.
Documented procedures and playbooks must be available for executing this capability.

title: Establish a Communication Map

references.name: NIST SP 800-61 Rev. 2: Incident Response Preparation
SANS: Incident Response Team Development and Preparation
